name: Little Brother
description:
Little Brother is an anti-big brother themed match 3 game that was partially inspired from the events surrounding Edward Snowden.  This was the first fore into doing JavaScript based games and one of the first games made as part of our gamedev club, Gamkedo (http://gamkedo.club).

Project Lead, Main Programming: Jeremy Kenyon

Art: Sasha Reneau

Game Programming: Marcus Silva, Sam Tobia

Music: Calix Reneau
